CI Visibility & Test Instrumentation.description: Integrates with CI/CD pipelines to provide insights into test suite performance and reliability. It tracks test executions, captures code coverage, and helps developers improve the efficiency of their testing cycles.

Remote Configuration & Telemetry.description: Manages the tracer's configuration settings remotely and reports its own operational health and performance metrics. This allows for centralized management of tracer behavior and ensures the monitoring system itself is reliable and efficient.

Core Instrumentation Engine.description: The foundational native component that enables all monitoring capabilities by integrating deeply with the .NET runtime. It manages the low-level hooks, IL rewriting, and runtime event collection that power tracing, profiling, and security analysis.

Automatic Instrumentation Engine.description: Provides out-of-the-box monitoring for a wide range of .NET frameworks, libraries, and data stores. This module automatically instruments application components like web frameworks (ASP.NET, ASP.NET Core), databases (SQL Server, Redis, MongoDB), and cloud services (AWS, Azure) to capture performance data without manual setup.

This module provides tools for capturing application snapshots, analyzing exceptions, and troubleshooting issues in real-time.
